name: nymphomania
content:
Add to word list

the behaviour of a woman who likes to have sex very often, especially with a lot of different people, which was considered in the past to be an illness: The essence of her character was not nymphomania but a longing to be loved. Her sex drive bordered on nymphomania. See
nymphomaniac
More examplesFewer examplesThey tried to "cure" her nymphomania.He watched his daughters for signs of nymphomania.They argued that nymphomania explained the criminal behaviour of his wife.
